title: Account Manager
description:
**Om tjänsten** 




 Wrknest söker nu en Account Manager till Upstream. Upstream är en distributör som går mot strömmen och levererar unika mjukvarulösningar till IT-verksamheter. De har lång erfarenhet och erbjuder expertis inom proaktiv, effektiv och automatiserad IT-drift på den nordiska marknaden. Upstream söker konstant efter smarta alternativ till traditionella sätt att arbeta. Tack vare detta har de lyckats hitta produkter och arbetssätt som öppnar upp för nya möjligheter att arbeta mer mobilt, mer förebyggande och mer effektivt. De kompletterar lösningarna med spetskompetens och personlig kundsupport. Upstreams drivkraft är att hitta teknik och metoder som gör livet enklare. Dessutom tror de på långsiktighet och konstant utveckling. Mainstream är ofta ganska trist. Upstream är roligare!
 



 På Upstream gillar de att ha kul på jobbet och firar gärna framgångar med resor, middagar, aktiviteter och kick offs! Som Account Manager hos Upstream får du komma in på en arbetsplats med högt i tak och få möjligheten att ta del av den breda kompetens och kunskap som de besitter inom teknisk försäljning.
 



 Detta är en direktrekrytering via Wrknest med anställning hos Upstream och all kontakt sköts direkt med Wrknest för denna process.
 



**Dina framtida arbetsuppgifter** 




 I din roll som Account Manager kommer du att sälja Upstreams nytänkande IT-lösningar samt produkter till IT-bolag. Deras målgrupper är IT-leverantörer, Interna IT-avdelningar samt IT inom retail. Du kommer att äga hela säljprocessen och göra allt från att boka webbmöten till att genomföra webbmöten och göra avslut. Du kommer också att göra uppföljningar med dina kunder och stämma av hur processerna går samt driva merförsäljning. Den här rollen passar dig som har en entreprenöriell ådra, som drivs av din egna framgång och som är van vid att arbeta självständigt då du själv kommer att ansvara för att driva dina processer framåt.
 



**Vi söker dig som har** 



* Gymnasial examen
* 3-5 års arbetslivserfarenhet
* Starkt IT-intresse
* Erfarenhet av försäljning
* Behärskar svenska samt engelska flytande i både tal och skrift



**Vi ser det som meriterande** 



* Erfarenhet av teknisk/komplex försäljning
* Erfarenhet av B2B-försäljning



*Vid denna rekrytering lägger vi stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper, då de är avgörande för hur du kommer att lyckas i rollen och företaget. Vi förstår att man inte kan allting från början – men du ska ha en vilja att lära dig! Därför söker vi dig som är självgående, resultatinriktad, problemlösande och affärsmässig. Du har en hög social kompetens, hög drivkraft och lätt för att knyta kontakter.* 




**Övrig information** 




 Start: Omgående eller med hänsyn till eventuell uppsägning
 



 Anställningsform: Heltid (40h/veckan)
 



 Placering: Kista, Stockholm
 



 För att snabbt komma in i företaget och arbetsuppgifter kommer du att få en onboarding i samband med start.
 



 Sök gärna så snart som möjligt då vi jobbar med löpande urval.

title: Senior Project Controls Manager
description:
At Mace, our purpose is to redefine the boundaries of ambition. We believe in creating places that are responsible, bringing transformative impact to our people, communities and societies across the globe. To learn more about our purpose, culture, and priorities, visit our strategy site.
   

  

 Within our consult business, we harness our unique combination of leading-edge practical expertise and project delivery consultancy to unlock the potential in every project.
   

  

**The Project**
 Our Consultancy portfolio spans three core divisions: property and corporate real estate, infrastructure, and international markets. We leverage the latest innovation, regional expertise and global best practice to continuously improve and advance infrastructure delivery, advising on critical public services and works of cultural importance; driving growth in developing countries and delivering some of the world's most technically complex and inspiring programmes of work.
   

  

 How do we do it? As agile partners with diversity and inclusivity at the core, we tap into the best expertise from our pool of talent and integrate seamlessly with our clients to understand their individual challenges. We bring new ideas and fresh thinking to our model which is grounded on transparency, innovation and best practice from around the world. We deliver on time and on budget, to the highest standard.
   

  

 We are hiring an ambitious and forward-thinking Project Controls Manager join our established and growing team. We offer a competitive salary and hybrid working options.
   

  

 Our Values Shape The Way We Consult And Define The People We Want To Join Us On Our Journey, They Are
   

  

* Safety first - Going home safe and well
* Client focus - Deliver on our promise
* Integrity - Always do the right thing
* Create opportunity - For our people to excel


 Manages and coordinates a range of PMO and project controls services to support designated projects within the PMO and planning centre of excellence.
   

  

**You’ll Be Responsible For**
* Directing and managing application of specific project controls methods, techniques and tools with a good working knowledge of a variety of techniques on a range of project and programme complexity.
* Directing and managing a team of professionals delivering projects controls services and responsible for staff development.
* Being able to evaluate trends and communicate analysis and corrective measures effectively in a complex project environment using numerical and statistical techniques as part of a multi-disciplinary team.
* Leading application of specific project controls methods, techniques and tools.
* Good working knowledge of EVM and project controls methodologies.
* Advising on complex requirements and communicate analysis and corrective measures effectively.
* Managing projects controls delivery of medium/high complexity projects/programmes.
* Playing a key role in multidisciplinary teams and take lead role in creating plans or analysing trends using numerical and statistical techniques.
* Leading and managing a team of professionals delivering projects controls services and responsible for staff development.
* Managing assistant managers & managers where required by the scale of the project.
* Persuading and influencing colleagues.
* Influencing clients to accept proposals and recommendations.
* Satisfying customer requirements.
* Tackling problems that do not have an obvious solution.
* Delegating tasks to others.
* Selling the business and winning work.
* Creating and delivering persuasive presentations to large audiences.
* Spotting and developing talented individuals.


**You’ll Need To Have**
* Good working knowledge of Microsoft Office products e.g. MS Word, MS Excel and MS PowerPoint.
* Good communication and interpersonal skills.
* Willingness to be part of a high performing team.
* Articulate and has potential to assimilate information quickly.
* Attention to detail.
* Experience of working on construction projects and/or consultancy.
* Experience of delivering effective PMO and project controls/assurance frameworks/strategies.
* Good knowledge of PMO and project controls tools, techniques and software (e.g. MS office and Power BI, Aconex, Primavera P6 and RiskHive).
* An interest in data analytics.
* Understanding of construction/delivery lifecycle and/or consultancy.
* Knowledge of PMO and project controls service delivery in one or more sectors (e.g. rail, highways, nuclear, public sector, hospitals)
* Good interpersonal skills and potential ability to form effective working relationships.
* Effectively collaborates with others.
* Ability to articulate complex information and ideas for a non-technical audience.
* Seeks to continuously improve.
* Creating and delivering clear and professional presentations to project teams/clients.


**You’ll Also Have**
* Process improvements.
* Strong communication and engagement skills.
* Effective networking skills.
* Ability to contribute establishment of high performing teams.
* Resilient/robust in the face of challenging situations, clients, personalities.
* Flexible, pragmatic and adaptable.
* Experience supporting the delivery of a range of PMO and project controls services.
* APM Planning and Project Controls (PPC) foundation and practitioner.
* Relevant university degree (e.g. construction, engineering) (or equivalent).


 Mace is an inclusive employer and welcomes interest from a diverse range of candidates. Even if you feel you do not fulfil all of the criteria, please apply as you may still be the best candidate for this role or another role within our organisation.
   

  

 We are also open to discussing part-time, flexible, and hybrid working options if suitable within the role.

title: OiT-189 Bentley ProjectWise Support Engineer (EMEIA)
description:
Role Summary
   

  

 The successful candidate as a Bentley Systems ProjectWise Specialist you will play a crucial role in optimizing project management and data management processes. You will be responsible for implementing and maintaining Bentley Systems ProjectWise, a comprehensive software solution for managing infrastructure and engineering content throughout the project lifecycle.
   

  

 You will have a technical experience in the Design, Implementation, Support and Management of Bentley ProjectWise as well as the integration with other associated engineering applications such as OpenBuildings, OpenRoads, OpenRail, MicroStation, Civil 3D, AutoCAD, ContextCapture, gINT, LumenRT, PLAXIS etc.
   

  

 Many of our key projects are hosted in ProjectWise and require complex configuration as well as ongoing maintenance to meet the needs of our varied client base in a fast-paced business. Close collaboration with key stakeholders, clients, joint ventures, and colleagues is therefore essential.
   

  

 Our infrastructure and network services are provided by a third-party supplier and collaborative problem solving is a must. An understanding of the relationship between application performance and the underlying infrastructure is essential.
   

  

 The successful candidate should have experience of working in a highly collaborative environment and should feel comfortable engaging with staff at all levels of the business as well as key project personnel externally. A background within an IT Organisation is preferred, although we will consider applications from individuals who have experience in ProjectWise Administration or BIM Management roles.
   

  

 Candidates will understand formal Incident Management process and delivery to Service Level Agreements. The successful candidate will be organised, an excellent communicator and able to deal with businesses delivering to high-pressure client deadlines.
   

  

**Responsibilities**
* Meeting customer expectations through resolving incidents within Service Level Agreements
* Maintaining ProjectWise Systems – Installations, configuration, and customisation to meet the specific needs of our projects and clients.
* Work with Key Stakeholders to design and implement efficient workflows within ProjectWise, ensuring seamless data and document management.
* User Training and Support to end-users on ProjectWise best practices, tools, and functionalities.
* Assist with Data Governance developing and to enforce data standards, naming conventions, and security protocols to maintain data integrity and compliance with relevant industry standards including ISO19650.
* Integrate ProjectWise with other engineering applications and platforms used across WSP and projects to enhance interoperability and streamline data exchange.
* Create and maintain comprehensive documentation of Bentley Applications support and ProjectWise configurations, processes, and user guidelines.
* Stay current with industry trends and technology advancements to recommend and implement enhancements to our ProjectWise setup and developing ProjectWise PowerShell scripts.
* Collaborating with the Application support, SAM and SCCM teams on Bentley software upgrades and deployments.


 Key Competencies
   

  

 Mandatory Skills
   

  

* Engaging with Clients and Key Stakeholders to build configurations and fix technical issues.
* An organised and methodical mindset
* A logical approach to problem-solving
* Exceptional customer service attitude
* The ability to self-prioritise and manage customer expectations.
* Experience of IT service delivery workflows e.g., ITIL
* Experience in support work management systems e.g., ServiceNow
* Experience of working with 3rd party software suppliers


 Contact
   

  

 For questions, please contact Hiring Manager, Phil Dilley (phil.dilley@wsp.com)

title: Psychometrician, 2 Hour Learning (Remote) - $100,000/year USD
description:
Crossover is the world's #1 source of full-time remote jobs. Our clients offer top-tier pay for top-tier talent. We're recruiting this role for our client, 2 Hour Learning. Have you got what it takes?
   

  

 Is translating educational theories into actionable assessments your superpower? Do you thrive in environments where excellence is the norm, dissecting and designing with a level of precision that only the keenest eye can achieve?
   

  

 We're scouting for an expert in psychometrics with a flair for distilling complex educational measurements into clear, effective tests to sculpt revolutionary educational experiences. Think you have checked all the right boxes so far? Then this is your opportunity to shine.
   

  

 At 2 Hour Learning, we're not just tinkering with the idea of AI in education; we're orchestrating a full-blown transformation. Scrap the old playbook of manual test creation. Textbooks? Obsolete. In this role, you will wield the power of generative AI to design prompts that delve deep into the subject matter, commanding it to produce test content that's personalized, engaging, and rigorous.
   

  

 Your experience in quantitative measurement and educational content creation will help you synthesize complex frameworks into AI prompts, yielding razor-sharp test questions that align tightly with educational standards. You will then quality control your outputs by crafting AI-first rubrics, ensuring each question and answer hits the mark and stimulates curiosity, enriching the learning journey. It's all about a relentless pursuit of excellence, a continuous cycle of refinement, and a dedication to content that not only meets but exceeds the bar.
   

  

 If you're seeking a role where you can blend creativity with technology and where your contributions have a lasting impact, 2 Hour Learning is where you belong. Take the leap and apply now!
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
* Creating and refining test content to meet rigorous educational standards, using a blend of psychometrics and generative AI tools
* Developing assessment rubrics with the help of AI that evaluate the depth, alignment, and educational impact of the test content
* Enhancing the quality of test content through a streamlined, iterative process for consistently superior and challenging assessments


**What You Won’t Be Doing**
* Creating test content manually – you will be using generative AI tools (such as ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude etc.) for every task
* Developing code to automate systems - you will focus on test design using AI, while our engineers handle the tech specifics


**Psychometrician Key Responsibilities**
 Applying your psychometric expertise to develop and refine test content with the help of AI, ensuring the assessments are personalized, rigorous, and aligned with educational standards
   

  

**Basic Requirements**
* Bachelor's degree or higher with a focus on psychometrics, educational measurement and statistics, OR at least 3 years of experience creating content for standardized tests (SAT, ACT, etc.) within an edtech environment
* Basic familiarity with and an eagerness to rapidly master AI tools and their application in test content development
* A user-centric approach and the ability to critically evaluate content in terms of appropriateness, accuracy, and relevance


**About 2 Hour Learning**
 2hr Learning is powered by AI technology that enables schools to provide personalized, mastery learning to students, enabling them to learn faster than standard school, thereby freeing up the rest of the school day to pursue their passions and interests.
   

  

 There is so much to cover for this exciting role, and space here is limited. Hit the Apply button if you found this interesting and want to learn more. We look forward to meeting you!
   

  

**Working with Crossover**
 This is a full-time (40 hours per week), long-term position. The position is immediately available and requires entering into an independent contractor agreement with Crossover. The compensation level for this role is $50 USD/hour, which equates to $100,000 USD/year assuming 40 hours per week and 50 weeks per year. The payment period is weekly. Consult www.crossover.com/help-and-faqs for more details on this topic.
   

  

**What to expect next:**
* You will receive an email with a link to start your self-paced, online job application.
* Our hiring platform will guide you through a series of online “screening” assessments to check for basic job fit, job-related skills, and finally a few real-world job-specific assignments.


**Important!** 
 If you do not receive an email from us:
   

  

* First, emails may take up to 15 minutes to send, refresh and check again.
* Second, check your spam and junk folders for an email from Crossover.com, mark as “Not Spam” since you will receive other emails as well.
* Third, we will send to whatever email account you indicated on the Apply form - by default, that is the email address you use as your LinkedIn username and it might be different than the one you have already checked.
* If all else fails, just reset your password by visiting https://www.crossover.com/auth/password-recovery if you already applied using LinkedIn EasyApply.

title: OiT-237 Data Classification and Labeling Analyst
description:
**WSP** 
 is a global consulting firm assisting public and private clients to plan, develop, design, construct, operate and maintain thousands of critical infrastructure projects around the world.
   

  

**Position Summary**
 We are seeking a meticulous and detail-oriented Data Classification and Labeling Analyst to join our Security Engineering and Operations team. The successful candidate will be responsible for accurately classifying and labeling large datasets to support our machine learning and data analysis initiatives.
   

  

**A day in the life**
 Specific areas of responsibility may fall into any one of the following areas of Data Classification and Labeling:
   

  

* Refine data discovery, classification, and labelling requirements (e.g., data sources, data/file types, integrations)
* Develop Internal Data Process / Placement Mapping
* Define classification and labelling schema and lifecycle handling policies
* Identify gaps in current solution (e.g., MS Purview) identify additional tooling required
* Select, implement, and configure solution to scan, map, classify, and label WSP’s data holdings
* Configure solution to enable automated and manual sensitive data labelling for M365 apps and services (incl. configuring mail flow rules)
* Prioritize and onboard data sources for scanning (e.g., structured, unstructured data across applications, databases, file shares, cloud storage)
* Execute scans, build data maps, and tune classifications
* Develop policies and procedures to communicate, operationalize, and sustain discovery, classification, and labelling capabilities


**Leadership And People Responsibilities**
* Develop positive working relationships with other team members and business partners and partners across teams to align with WSPs internal and external client demands.
* Provide feedback on the governance process for continued improvement.


  

  

**Finance/Budgetary Responsibilities**
* Provide feedback on tooling and identify additional needs
* Plan for expanse of security tools to cover ongoing needs
* Evaluation of license usage and potential growth


**What You’ll Bring To WSP**
* 7-+ years related experience in data management or similar position.
* Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, data sciences, or related field
* Proficiency in data analysis tools and software (purview). Familiarity with machine learning concepts is a plus.
* Strong analytical skills with a keen eye for detail and accuracy.
* Experience with IT Governance frameworks such as COBIT, ITIL and ISO 2700x, NIST
* Experience with governance, compliance, and audit within IT environments
* Experience of risk management, including risk analysis, mitigation, and monitoring
* Knowledge of information security regulations applicable to WSP


  

  

**What Sets You Apart**
* Master's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, data sciences, or related field

 For questions, please contact Hiring Manager, Matthew Groff (matthew.groff@wsp.com)

title: Senior Publisher Technical Account Manager  (programmatic advertising)
description:
PubMatic (Nasdaq: PUBM) is an independent technology company maximizing customer value by delivering digital advertising’s supply chain of the future.
   

  

 PubMatic’s sell-side platform empowers the world’s leading digital content creators across the open internet to control access to their inventory and increase monetization by enabling marketers to drive return on investment and reach addressable audiences across ad formats and devices.
   

  

 Since 2006, our infrastructure-driven approach has allowed for the efficient processing and utilization of data in real time. By delivering scalable and flexible programmatic innovation, we improve outcomes for our customers while championing a vibrant and transparent digital advertising supply chain.
   

  

**Position Description**

As PubMatic's products and services evolve, the Senior Customer Success Operations Manager must stay at the forefront of new capabilities to ensure that the implementation process is defined, tested with new publishers, and ready for broad adoption.

What makes us come together is that we all understand the importance of keeping our clients happy. We all add value and collaborate in different ways, and we all have a common goal. ****Requirements:****

title: OIT-239 Attack Surface Reduction Analyst
description:
**Attack Surface Reduction** 
 Analyst
   

  

 WSP is a global consulting firm assisting public and private clients to plan, develop, design, construct, operate and maintain thousands of critical infrastructure projects around the world.
   

  

**Position Summary**
 The Attack Surface Reduction Analyst will play a critical role in enhancing our organization’s cybersecurity posture by identifying, assessing, and mitigating vulnerabilities and threats across our digital environment. This role involves a combination of strategic analysis, hands-on implementation, and collaboration with various teams to reduce our attack surface and improve our overall security resilience.
   

  

**A day in the life**
**Specific areas of responsibility may fall into any one of the following areas of** 
 Attack Surface Reduction:
   

  

**Vulnerability Assessment:** 
 Conduct thorough assessments to identify potential vulnerabilities and weaknesses in our systems, applications, and networks.
   

  

**Attack Surface Analysis:** 
 Analyze and map out the organization’s attack surface, including endpoints, network components, applications, and cloud environments, to identify areas of risk.
   

  

**Mitigation Strategies:** 
 Develop and implement strategies and controls to reduce attack vectors and minimize potential entry points for malicious activities.
   

  

**Risk Evaluation:** 
 Continuously evaluate emerging threats and vulnerabilities and assess their impact on our attack surface.
   

  

**Incident Response Support:** 
 Collaborate with the Incident Response team to address and resolve security incidents related to identified vulnerabilities or attack vectors.
   

  

**Collaboration:** 
 Work closely with I&O, Risk, SOC, SecDevOps, and other relevant teams to integrate security practices into the development and deployment processes.
   

  

**Security Tools:** 
 Utilize and configure security tools and technologies for vulnerability scanning, threat intelligence, and attack surface monitoring.
   

  

**Documentation & Reporting:** 
 Maintain detailed documentation of vulnerabilities, risk assessments, and mitigation actions. Prepare and present reports to stakeholders on security posture and risk status.
   

  

**Continuous Improvement:** 
 Stay current with industry trends, threat intelligence, and emerging technologies to continually enhance our attack surface reduction strategies.
   

  

**Leadership And People Responsibilities**
* Develop positive working relationships with other team members and business partners and partners across teams to align with WSPs internal and external client demands.
* Provide feedback on the governance process for continued improvement.


  

  

**Finance/Budgetary Responsibilities**
* Provide feedback on tooling and identify additional needs
* Plan for expanse of security tools to cover ongoing needs
* Evaluation of license usage and potential growth


**What** 
 you’ll bring to WSP
   

  

**Required**
* 7-+ years related experience in Security Operations, Network Security, Vuln. Management or similar position.
* Bachelor's degree or equivalent in Information Technology, Computer Science, Engineering, Data Sciences, or related field
* Strong knowledge of security assessment tools, vulnerability scanning, and penetration testing
* Proficiency in security tools: Microsoft Defender, Microsoft Defender EASM, BitSight, Cybel Angel and others.
* Strong analytical skills with a keen eye for detail and accuracy
* Effective communication skills, with the ability to clearly convey technical concepts to both technical and non-technical stakeholders
* Experience with IT Governance frameworks such as COBIT, ITIL, NIST and ISO 2700x
* Experience with risk management, including risk analysis, mitigation, and monitoring


  

  

**What Sets You Apart**
* Master’s degree in information technology, Computer Science, Engineering, Data Sciences or related field
* Security+, CISSP, or other related certifications.


**Contact**
 For more information, please contact Hiring Manager, Matthew Groff, matthew.groff@wsp.com

title: DevOps Ingenjör
description:
***Devops-ingenjör sökes till teknikbolag!***


Är du redo att kliva in i en dynamisk värld av banbrytande teknologi och innovation? Vår kund söker nu erfarna Devops-ingenjörer som är redo att bidra till spännande projekt inom fordons-, telekom- och försvarsindustrin.

 ***Kund*** *är ett teknikkonsultbolag vars uppdrag spänner över hela utvecklingscykeln från systemering, arkitektur och design till implementation och verifiering. Som konsult hos kund kommer du verka inom industri, försvarsindustri, medtech, fordon samt telekom och vara en del i ett team som gillar mixen av häftig teknik och att ha kul på jobbet.*

  

Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.

 **Varför ansluta dig?**

* **Mångsidiga Projekt:** En attraktiv kombination av bransch- och teknikbredd, där uppdragen varierar och i projekt som sträcker sig över hela utvecklingscykeln med fokus på hållbara och säkra lösningar för det framtida samhället.
* **Valmöjligheter:** I och med sin stora kundbas kan företaget skräddarsy rollen efter dina förutsättningar, önskemål och intressen.
* **Karriärmöjligheter:** Känner du dig redo för nästa kliv som t.ex. Teamledare finns det stora möjligheter till det.
* **Work-life balance:** En arbetsmiljö som jobbar för att skapa de bästa förutsättningarna för långsiktig balans samt en hållbar utveckling och karriär.

 **Din Roll som Devops-ingenjör:**

* Samarbeta med ett dynamiskt team, antingen på kontoret i Göteborg eller på plats hos kunder runt regionen, med viss flexibilitet för distansarbete.
* Du kommer att arbeta med att strategiskt införa containers i utvecklingsmiljö.
* Arbeta med applikationsmigrering från enskilda VMs via GitOps flöden till kubernetes.
* Arbeta med fokus på blueprint-tänk, där ni samarbetar med flera datacenter, siter, länder för att skapa effektiva och stabila plattformar för utvecklingsteam.

 **Vem är du?**


Vi söker dig som är civil- eller högskoleingenjör och som har erfarenhet av ovanstående område, som containers i utvecklingsmiljö och applikationsmigrering. Exempelvis har du erfarenhet av GitOps, Kubernetes, GitLab, Flux, Helm med mera.  

  



I denna tjänst krävs svenskt medborgarskap.

 **Övrig information**

* Start: Enligt överenskommelse
* Omfattning: Heltid
* Placering: Göteborg
* Eventuella frågor besvaras av rekryterare Ebba Strömberg:  

076-883 80 05 / ebba.stromberg@futuriapeople.se

  

Passar det här in på dig eller känner du någon som skulle passa bättre för jobbet? - Tipsa gärna!

  

Intervjuer sker löpande, välkommen med din ansökan idag!

 ***Futuria People*** *är rekryteringsföretaget som hjälper individer att ta nästa steg i sin karriär och företag att attrahera nya medarbetare. Genom uppsökande rekrytering och kvalitativ annonsering har vi hjälpt hundratals kandidater till ett nytt jobb och en mer stimulerande vardag.*

title: Senior Systems Engineer
description:
**General information**
-----------------------

### **Reference**

2024-660
**Position description**
------------------------

### **Job title**


Senior Systems Engineer

### **Contract type**


1 = fulltime - unlimited

### **About the Role**

  

Join our dynamic team of five Systems Engineers based in Stockholm and Oslo, working in a hybrid model (60% onsite, 40% remote). You'll demonstrate your technical expertise in architecting, deploying, and sustaining complex server infrastructures across physical, virtual, and cloud environments.

  

Our team is responsible for the operation, maintenance, and monitoring of financial services on Microsoft platforms, hosted in European datacenters and MS Azure. You'll also collaborate with international colleagues on internal applications, O365, and endpoint management.

  

We are aspiring to adopt a DevOps culture and are progressively transitioning our solutions to the cloud.

 **Responsibilities**

* Design, automate, implement, and operate MS Windows-based server environments, primarily on-premises within datacenters in Frankfurt, Stockholm, and London, as well as in Azure.
* Maintain and operate internal applications, collaboration tools, and endpoints for the internal user environment.
* Monitor Infront financial services and market data processing systems.
* Resolve errors and alarms quickly and provide timely escalation.
* Work independently to troubleshoot, perform root cause analysis, identify, and isolate technical issues.
* Perform design, test, and implementation of complex technical solutions and architectures.
* Complete tasks required to maintain service levels and availability of all site features and functions.
* Help define and support process improvements.
* Provide on-call duty between 6am and 11pm on weekdays once every 5 weeks.


### **Who you are**


* Minimum 5 years of documented experience relevant to this position.
* Preferred knowledge and affinity with financial technology (FinTech).
* Experienced with O365 administration and operations.
* Demonstrated Windows clients and server skills.
* Experience with Azure cloud; Azure certifications (e.g., MS Azure Administrator, MS Azure Integration and Security, MS Azure Infrastructure and Deployment) are preferable.
* An enthusiastic, positive, and effective attitude with a get-things-done approach.
* Eager to learn about new technologies and trends; eager to further develop yourself.
* Good problem-solving and analytical skills.
* Good communication skills (English).

 **Preferable experience in one or more of the following:**

* Cloud computing (Azure, AWS)
* Virtualization/clusters (Hyper-V)
* Active Directory
* Security
* Database administration and management (MSSQL/Postgres)
* Endpoint management/automation (Microsoft System Center/Intune)
* PowerShell scripting


### **Why join Infront?**


Infront offers exciting projects in an innovative and international environment, with modern systems and new technologies that are unique in Europe. We have a professional work culture and a start-up environment, with the advantage of being an established company. You have the freedom to contribute your own ideas and are given the opportunity to develop professionally and personally.

  

At Infront, we emphasize work-life balance through our hybrid model, which allows for both in-office collaboration and remote flexibility. Our diverse team – close to 500 employees from over 30 nations and a leadership team that spans 6 countries – reflects our commitment to diversity and inclusion. We invite everyone to apply to join us (regardless of race, religion, gender, age, disability, etc.) and are committed to equal opportunities for all. Join us and contribute to our thriving, diverse community.


**Position location**
---------------------

### **Job location**


Sweden, Stockholm

### **Company**


Infront Sweden AB (SWE)

**Candidate criteria**
----------------------

### **Languages**


English (3- Business fluent)

**Handled by**
--------------

### **Last name**


Larios Romo

### **Forename**


Miriam
company_description: Seit Jahrzehnten hilft Infront Finanzverantwortlichen, schneller fundierte Entscheidungen zu treffen. Heute tun wir das als einer der europaweit führenden Anbieter von Marktdaten und Software.

title: Software Consultant
description:
**We are looking for a Software Consultant for our client. Together with your team you will monitor the CI environment and ensure that the different build pipelines are up and running. The team is also involved in the development of the CI environment and in the automation of different tasks like building, testing, packaging, and releasing software.**


### **Requirements**


* You and the team supports the developers with debugging and analysis of problems that occur in the CI system.
* A good CI system and support to the development teams are key to ensure a fast and agile development environment.
* You have a keen interest in DevOps used in modern SW development and experience in securing a stable development environment and building integration environments that enables a fast feedback loop for developers.
* You like solving problems together with and through others.
* To be successful in this job our client believes that you have experience from analyzing, troubleshooting, and debugging problems in a complex software build system, both compilation and test logs as well as system logs on the build machines.
* Give support to different parts of the organization such as developers, testers, and management. Interest in the automation of tasks.
* You should have a solid knowledge about CI/CD systems, Git, Jenkins, and Gerrit are required. Competence in in Python, Docker, and working with cloud-based solutions is required.

title: Digital Product Leader
description:
**Job ID:** R0007008


**Date posted:** 26/08/2024


**Company description** **The IKEA vision is to create a better everyday life for the many people – our customers, co-workers and suppliers.**


IKEA Supply is responsible for securing that the product offer is produced and delivered to our customers. We lead the supply agenda across many functions and work together with all business areas, different business units, but also retail markets to secure customer availability in all markets and sales channels at lowest total cost.


Supply Chain Development (SCD) is going into the next phase of a great journey. By gathering the end-to-end supply chain development agenda into one organization, embedding process and the development and management of digital solutions into the business, we create the best preconditions for meeting the future with the right competences and business capabilities.


By this we will also create the preconditions to a world class supply chain that enable IKEA to efficiently respond to the ever-changing customer needs. The SCD function includes four areas: Procurement, Supply Chain Planning, **Logistics & Fulfilment**, Intralogistics. Additionally, SCD has three assignments to lead and keep together the overarching development in the field of Data & Technology in Supply, Business Process Management & Identification for total IKEA and the Development Networks to lead collaborative innovation approach around Logistics and Fulfilment. Three enabling functions will be key to support the whole organization: BN Performance & Support, Communication and People & Culture. Our mission is to design & secure the preconditions for a world class supply chain, run and improve everyday solutions, keep together, and optimize the development and innovation agenda.

 **Job description**  

Within the Fulfilment development part of SCD Logistics & Fulfilment Development we identified 3 key areas:

* **Digital developments around Store & Service Fulfilment** – This assignment will mainly focus on process and digital solutions with dedicated support for all IKEA Retailers.
* Conceptual framework and learning offer related to Customer Fulfilment function for all retailers. This assignment is attached to the IKEA Retail Concept responsibility.
* Strategic development, Retail fulfilment equipment development and Expansion.


The assignment will specifically focus on the **Store & Service Fulfilment development** areas.


As a **Digital Product Leader**, you Lead the development and operations of a value driven and user-friendly digital product. With that you represent the needs of the IKEA stakeholder community, the voice of the users, towards the team to ensure maximum value. You understand customer needs and validate that the developed solutions solve these needs.


Your job specific key tasks and responsibilities are:

* to set the product vision with a clear product roadmap, ensuring it aligns with Inter IKEA’s digital roadmap ambitions.
* accountable for the product backlog (build, edit and maintain) and to clearly communicate the backlog.
* accountable for product prioritization through user stories to meet business needs and user experience.
* enable exploration of new business potentials.
* to comply with relevant frameworks and standards for the digital product.
* securing the composition and operational functioning of the digital product team.
* accountable for digital product release plan, communication and setting of expectations for delivery of new features and functionalities.
* to manage key stakeholder engagement (e.g. user, supplier).
* to ensure that the digital product maximizes business value, controlling the costs and giving input to the overall budget.
* to manage dependencies and blockers, improve digital product delivery capabilities and gather insights to understand and empathize with the user’s reality.
* to identify and create measures of success to understand how the product achieves business outcomes.

  

In this role you will report to the Digital Product Area Manager for Store & Service Fulfilment, within SCD area Logistics & Fulfilment Development.

 **Qualification**  

You are a strong person with excellent analytical skills and good knowledge of the business context. You have excellent listening skills and the capability to express complex and/or complicated content in a receiver oriented and structured way. You have relevant supply chain experience and/or Retail Experience in the field of Inventory & Logistics and Customer Fulfilment. Interdependently you can lead and deliver in projects/business cases, with timely deliverables and with high quality analysis and contribute with a holistic view, being customer centric and having the end-to-end in focus.


We see that you are highly driven by development & Innovation and constantly being on the way. You dare to think differently, and you have an agile approach and adapt as we go. You are interested in technology, digitalization and finding new ways of working and are highly motivated to do this by collaborating and interacting with different stakeholders. You show a positive attitude, are self-going, persistent and motivated by taking on challenges.

**From previous assignments you bring:**

* experience of progressive and diverse experience in digital product development.
* demonstrable experience in working in an Agile or DevOps working set-up.
* strong business acumen and a strategic & commercial mind-set.
* knowledge and experience working with various technologies.
* experience working with and understanding the needs of customers or clients (internal or external).
* proven analytical skills and experience making decisions based on hard and soft data.
* strong communication skills with business and technical stakeholders.
* skills in leadership, collaboration and team working.

*The position is based in Malmö (Sweden) and will require travelling.*


We offer you a position in a fast-paced, truly global environment with an endless supply of future opportunities.

 **More Information**  

If you have any questions about the role, please contact Hiring Manger Bruno Weiss bruno.weiss1@inter.ikea.com


Please also note that we do only handle applications in English and no applications coming in by email.

**We look forward to receiving your application by the latest 8th September 2024.**  

You might have some questions about the recruitment process, and we are more than happy to answer those! Feel free to connect with the People & Culture Leader Dan Gustafsson at dan.gustafsson@inter.ikea.com
company_description: At IKEA, we share an inspiring vision: “to create a better everyday life for the many people”.

title: Arkitekt inom Edge & IoT på TechSeed
description:
*På TechSeed är vi övertygade om att det är tekniken som kommer göra världen till en bättre plats. Vi ser ett stort behov i vårt samhälle att kombinera affärsförståelse, digitalt ledarskap samt innovativa arbetssätt och lösningar med framtidens tekniker i uppkopplade ekosystem. Vi tror på en hållbar framtid med säkra lösningar genom exempelvis IoT-lösningar, digitala tvillingar, AI och cybersäkerhet. Det här är vårt WHY och det fyller oss med energi varje dag. Det här är vår arena.*


TechSeed är ett medarbetarägt bolag som erbjuder konsulttjänster och har ett kompetensdjup inom flera domäner. Vi är på en kraftig tillväxtresa och söker nu lösningsarkitekter som även kommer få en stor grad av inflytande och insyn i hur vi växer framåt och tar ett helhetsgrepp om uppkopplade ekosystem och lösningar. Vi söker dig som trivs i konsultrollen och samtidigt vill bidra till att skapa vägen framåt för TechSeed – Tillsammans.


Som **Lösningsarkitekt** kommer du arbeta som konsult i samarbete med kund. TechSeed strävar efter att kunna erbjuda en blandning mellan placering hos kund och projekt som leds av TechSeed. Respektive uppdrag sätter förutsättningarna och det förväntas att du är bekväm med båda alternativen.


I den här rollen kommer du tillhöra enheten TechSeed Edge & IoT Göteborg, vars fokus sträcker sig från vision till leverans av uppkopplade system. IoT och IIoT handlar till stor del om att fånga datapunkter från verkligheten, en verklighet där kundernas utmaningar omfattar helt olika processer och verksamheter. Kanske är det du som sätter lösningsarkitekturen för fastighetsbolaget som önskar styra värme, vatten och ventilation mer hållbart. Kanske handlar ditt nästa uppdrag om att lösa insamling av mätdata i maritim miljö med utmaningar i såväl miljö, uppkoppling, underhåll och energiförsörjning. Edge syftar på bearbetning av data nära källan, vilket styrs av krav på säkerhet, bandbredd och underhåll. Som lösningsarkitekt ansvarar du för att fånga kundens krav, önskemål, möjligheter och utmaningar, samt såklart ta fram en lösningsarkitektur. Det förutsätter en teknisk bredd och ett nära samarbete med kund.


Som delägare och anställd kommer du vara med i utvecklingen av våra erbjudanden, få möjlighet att påverka de områden som du drivs av och samtidigt få tryggheten av ett team med gemensamt mål och gemensamma intressen.


Vår grund ligger i att vi delar med oss av vår passion för teknik och värdet vi skapar. Det handlar bland annat om kunskapsutbyte och att dela idéer, bidra med god stämning såväl som att skapa värde genom vårt delägarskap. Vi erbjuder dig:

* Inflytande i hur vi bygger TechSeed tillsammans
* En öppen kultur där vi värdesätter olikheter, insikter och innovationer
* Direkt värde från våra finansiella resultat genom bonus och delägarskap
* Möjligheten att växa in i olika tekniska områden / ansvarsområden utifrån dina önskemål
* Flexibelt arbete hemifrån, beroende på uppdragets behov.

**Vem söker vi?**


Vi söker dig vars expertis är lösningsarkitektur inom IoT / IIoT. Du förväntas ha bredd i dina tekniska kunskaper och god förståelse för hur tekniska lösningar, protokoll och plattformar bör kombineras för att möta kundernas behov. Några exempel på teknik och begrepp från vår vardag; AMQP, AWS/GCP/Azure IoT, Bluetooth, CoAP, DDS, DevOps, Digital Twin, HMI, IT/OT, Linux, LoRaWAN, LTE CAT, LwM2M, Machine Learning, MES, Modbus, MQTT, NB-IoT, ONNX / PyTorch / Cuda, OPC UA, PKI, PLC, PROFINET, SCADA, Sparkplug, Wi-Fi, ZigBee.
  

  

Om delar av ovan är en ingår i din vokabulär, verktygslåda och fångar ditt intresse - hör av dig!


Du är såklart nyfiken på ny teknik, trivs i roller där du utvecklas och i en kultur där vi hjälps åt och bygger bolaget **tillsammans**. Du har minst 5 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet, är självklart lösningsorienterad och trivs i samarbete med kund. Eftersom vi arbetar med flera typer av kunder med olika behov kräver rollen att du kan uttrycka dig obehindrat på svenska och engelska i tal och skrift. Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet av att jobba på ett start/scale-up, har tidigare konsulterfarenhet eller relevanta kunskaper från industrivertikaler och marknadsområden.


**Om TechSeed**


Vi är ett medarbetarägt konsultbolag i ScaleUp-fasen med visionen att skapa värde med uppkopplade lösningar. Vi tror på kombinationen av nära samarbeten, framtidens tekniker och att gemensamt arbeta för att skapa ett bolag vi verkligen trivs på. Genom att erbjuda delägarskap till våra anställda ger vi möjligheten till insyn och påverkan, samtidigt som det gynnar samarbeten och att prioritera vad som är bäst för gruppen. Detta speglas både i vår kultur och våra erbjudanden, där vi kombinerar vårt stora tekniska intresse med ett kundanpassat förhållningssätt samtidigt som vi har många sociala aktiviteter och en härlig gemenskap på kontoret. Vår arena är uppkopplade ekosystem, där tekniker som IoT och Intelligent Edge används för att skapa uppkopplade tjänster och system inom ekosystem som Smart Cities, Smart Factories, Smart Companies och Smart Buildings.

title: Cloud Platform Administrator
description:
**Company Description**  

Vattenfall is a European energy company with approximately 20 000 employees. For more than 100 years we have electrified industries, supplied energy to people’s homes and modernized our way of living through innovation and cooperation. We now want to make fossil-free living possible within one generation. To be able to reach this ambitious goal we are looking for talented individuals who, in addition to their passion for their own role, also have strong team spirit and want to contribute to supporting a meaningful corporate mission.

 **Job Description**  

You will join the international Cloud Platform Administration team. We are serving as the first line of support for all Vattenfall colleagues using our cloud platform . Your role will be pivotal in scripting solutions and automating processes to streamline operations and enhance efficiency. Beyond automation, you’ll manage configurations and provide OS support, keeping our environments optimized and secure also while offering expert SaaS, PaaS and IaaS support. In this role, your problem-solving skills will directly impact Vattenfall success, making you an essential part of our purpose!  

  

  

**Key Responsibilities:**  



* First Line of Support: Act as the initial point of contact for cloud-related inquiries, providing exceptional support and troubleshooting assistance to our clients.
* Problem Solving: Utilize strong analytical and problem-solving skills to diagnose and resolve complex cloud computing issues.
* Communication & Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams and clients to ensure seamless communication and effective problem resolution.
* Cloud Expertise: Leverage your in-depth knowledge of Microsoft Azure to provide expert guidance on cloud services, configurations, and optimizations.
* Security & Compliance: Ensure that cloud environments adhere to industry best practices for security and compliance, identifying and mitigating potential risks.
* Programming & Scripting: Use your proficiency in programming languages and scripting tools to automate tasks and enhance the efficiency of cloud operations.
* DevOps Practices: Apply your familiarity with DevOps tools and methodologies to streamline cloud deployment processes and maintain infrastructure as code.

  

**Qualifications**  

Do you enjoy working in the Cloud? Would you like utilize your broad skillset in IT as Cloud troubleshooter? Then this is your job! We are looking for someone who has worked in Cloud Administration in a large company before, and has a specialty in either Network; OS; BackUp; Security; Databases or Web. Furthermore you have:

* A Bachelor degree or equivalent working experience on that level
* Experience in Cloud Administration
* Fluency in English
* You live close the one of the below locations:
* Experience in and the ambition to perform first line support / troubleshooting

  

Location: for this position you can choose to be based in Berlin, Katowice, Gliwice, Amsterdam or Stockholm.

 **Additional Information**  

We offer a good remuneration package, an inspirational and international work environment, and the possibility to work with some of the best in the field. You can always count on support from committed colleagues. We offer attractive employment conditions like flexible working hours, home-office, opportunities for personal and professional development and a fun and inclusive working culture!

**More information**


We welcome your application in English, including CV and cover letter via our website. For more information about the recruitment process, you are welcome to contact Recruiter Folmer Koper +31 6 38710915.


At Vattenfall, we are convinced that striving for diversity helps building a more profitable, efficient and attractive company. We continue to seek a harmonious balance of employees in terms of gender, age, ethnic and cultural backgrounds.

title: Senior Lead Business Consultant - Gothenburg
description:
Dina arbetsuppgifter
  
We are looking for a Lead Business Consultant for our client in Gothenburg.
  
  

The goal of the project is to establish a solid base for managing the company's financial accounting, financial control, and billing procedures. This will be achieved by implementing the Dynamics 365 Finance and Operations modules, which offer comprehensive financial management features.
  
  

In this project, you will assess the current financial processes and capabilities of the organization to pinpoint any deficiencies and create the necessary specifications for the team in charge of implementation. Following the assessment, the team will develop a solution tailored to the organization's needs and deploy it using the Dynamics 365 platform.
  
  

**The project will concentrate on the following main areas:**  

* Financial Accounting: The project will create and put into operation its financial accounting procedures using the most effective methods for the chosen technology. This involves managing the general ledger, accounts payable and receivable, cash and bank transactions, and fixed assets.
* Financial Control: The project aims to assist the organization in implementing measures to comply with regulations and accurately analyze business profitability by setting up approval processes for financial transactions, ensuring separation of responsibilities, and introducing internal controls.
* Billing: The project will enhance the organization's billing procedures by automating the generation and handling of invoices and linking billing with other financial operations.


The team will collaborate closely with the finance department of the organization to make sure that the solution meets their needs and fits well with their operations. Additionally, the team will offer training and assistance to facilitate a seamless switch to the new system. They are seeking a candidate to join them during the project and quickly adapt to help with tasks related to shaping future work practices.
  
  

**Primary Duties:**  

* Assist the project by conducting evidence-based analysis of the business and digital landscape using information from various sources.
* Encourage the team to adopt a minimum viable product (MVP) approach by assisting in defining the minimum value and user-testable deliverables.
* Perform in-depth examination of business needs and operations, pinpointing areas for enhancement, and converting business requirements into functional specifications for the ERP system.
* Utilize data modeling techniques to study results and generate written reports to back up the analysis.
* Collaborate with and oversee various partners and stakeholders, both inside and outside the organization.
* Aid the team in resolving issues, emphasizing key tasks, and handling trade-offs.
* Conduct product demonstrations, train end-users, and lead workshops.


**Specific Activities:**  

* Conduct business process modeling for the new D365 solution and system setup.
* Develop VAS unique processes and procedures for Finance.
* Outline future business flows and define roles and responsibilities.
* Assist in strategizing for the expansion of ERP in 2025.
* Conduct analysis on the effects of replacing Hyperion and design a go-live solution. Evaluate necessary legal and company obligations to guarantee that VAS complies with all requirements in the new configuration, whether through manual or automated processes.


**Requirements:**  

For this position, we are seeking candidates with several years of experience in a related role that requires strong business analysis skills, including requirements engineering, and a collaborative and transparent work approach.
  
  

* Hands-on experience with finance supporting applications.
* Comprehensive knowledge of finance core business processes.
* Skilled in utilizing tools like Azure Devops, Confluence, or equivalent for handling backlogs, requirements, and facilitating workshops.
* Strong abilities in delivering presentations and documenting effectively.
* Skilled in leading workshops and handling stakeholder relationships.
* Expert in communicating verbally and in writing in English and Swedish, at a professional level, with previous experience in an international setting.
* You are passionate, driven, and well-organized as an individual, and thrive in a fast-paced work setting.


Meritorious
  
  

* Having familiarity with Dynamics 365 is beneficial.
* Having prior experience within the company is advantageous.


Tillträde och ansökan
  
**Start of the assignment:** 02 Sep 2024
  
**End of the assignment:** 31 Dec 2024
  
**Deadline:** 02 Sep 2024
  
**Location:** Gothenburg
  
**Contact person:** 0790 06 27 11
  
Selections and interwievs are ongoing!
  
  

Om oss
  
Sway Sourcing is a modern company that recruits in several industries on the Swedish labor market. We match candidates’ skills and knowledge with the company’s needs. Sway Sourcing has a company management and staff with extensive experience in the recruitment industry, both as owners and employees. We have a large network within the industries we specialize in and can therefore find the candidates who quickly become an asset for the companies.

title: DevOps Ingenjör
description:
Devops-ingenjör sökes till teknikbolag!
  
Är du redo att kliva in i en dynamisk värld av banbrytande teknologi och innovation? Vår kund söker nu erfarna Devops-ingenjörer som är redo att bidra till spännande projekt inom fordons-, telekom- och försvarsindustrin.
  
Kund är ett teknikkonsultbolag vars uppdrag spänner över hela utvecklingscykeln från systemering, arkitektur och design till implementation och verifiering. Som konsult hos kund kommer du verka inom industri, försvarsindustri, medtech, fordon samt telekom och vara en del i ett team som gillar mixen av häftig teknik och att ha kul på jobbet.
  
Tjänsten är en direktrekrytering vilket innebär att rekryteringsprocessen sker genom Futuria People men du kommer anställas direkt hos kund.
  
  

Varför ansluta dig?
  
**Mångsidiga Projekt:** En attraktiv kombination av bransch- och teknikbredd, där uppdragen varierar och i projekt som sträcker sig över hela utvecklingscykeln med fokus på hållbara och säkra lösningar för det framtida samhället.
  
**Valmöjligheter:** I och med sin stora kundbas kan företaget skräddarsy rollen efter dina förutsättningar, önskemål och intressen.
  
**Karriärmöjligheter:** Känner du dig redo för nästa kliv som t.ex. Teamledare finns det stora möjligheter till det.
  
**Work-life balance:** En arbetsmiljö som jobbar för att skapa de bästa förutsättningarna för långsiktig balans samt en hållbar utveckling och karriär.
  
  

**Din Roll som Devops-ingenjör:**  

Samarbeta med ett dynamiskt team, antingen på kontoret i Göteborg eller på plats hos kunder runt regionen, med viss flexibilitet för distansarbete.
  
Du kommer att arbeta med att strategiskt införa containers i utvecklingsmiljö.
  
Arbeta med applikationsmigrering från enskilda VMs via GitOps flöden till kubernetes.
  
Arbeta med fokus på blueprint-tänk, där ni samarbetar med flera datacenter, siter, länder för att skapa effektiva och stabila plattformar för utvecklingsteam.
  
  

Vem är du?
  
Vi söker dig som är civil- eller högskoleingenjör och som har erfarenhet av ovanstående område, som containers i utvecklingsmiljö och applikationsmigrering. Exempelvis har du erfarenhet av GitOps, Kubernetes, GitLab, Flux, Helm med mera.
  
I denna tjänst krävs svenskt medborgarskap.
  
  

Övrig information
  
**Start:** Enligt överenskommelse
  
**Omfattning:** Heltid
  
**Placering:** Göteborg
  
**Eventuella frågor besvaras av rekryterare Ebba Strömberg:** 076-883 80 05 / ebba.stromberg@futuriapeople.se
  
  

Passar det här in på dig eller känner du någon som skulle passa bättre för jobbet? - Tipsa gärna!
  
Intervjuer sker löpande, välkommen med din ansökan idag!
  
  

Futuria Peopleär rekryteringsföretaget som hjälper individer att ta nästa steg i sin karriär och företag att attrahera nya medarbetare. Genom uppsökande rekrytering och kvalitativ annonsering har vi hjälpt hundratals kandidater till ett nytt jobb och en mer stimulerande vardag.
